displaySettings.titleBarText: Zona H013 - Sensores de Fogo e Gás

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If {#1.Sts.Falha} Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ({#1.Sts.AHH} OR {#1.Sts.AH})) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND ({#1.Sts.AHH} OR {#1.Sts.AH})) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Falha})) Then 3 Else 4

parameter.description: Tag de Falha - Endereco do FTAE
Tag de Atuado - Endereco do FTAE

parameter.value: Detector de Chama da Estação de Offloading Popa

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If ({#1.Sts.Falha} AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Atuado}))Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 1 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) <> 0) AND {#1.Sts.Atuado}) Then 2 Else If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#3" ) == 0) AND (NOT {#1.Sts.Falha})) Then 3 Else 4
